title: Foursquare
description: Foursquare is a location-based social media platform recognized for its vibrant brand colors. The primary colors include a deep pink (#F94877), representing energy and passion; a dark blue (#0732A2), symbolizing trust and professionalism; and a lighter blue (#2D5BE3), conveying openness and reliability. These colors are prominently featured in the company's branding materials sourced from their official website and marketing assets.
